* Stefan Tilkov <stefan.tilkov@...> [2009-01-12 22:00]:
> * Aristotle Pagaltzis <pagaltzis@...> [2009-01-12 21:40]:
> > POSTing the URI of the old node to the new node seems like
> > the least objectionable approach to me.
>
> For "MOVE" semantics without a separate verb, I agree.

I thought about MOVE momentarily, but to me that seems more
objectionable: the old node isn’t overwritten as MOVE would
suggest, but rather their contents are merged. This is not
a MOVE, it’s something like, I dunno, SUBSUME.

And if I’m not going to adhere strictly to the contract of
a verb, I’d rather fall back on POST…

Regards,
-- 
Aristotle Pagaltzis // <http://plasmasturm.org/>
